long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nomadland is a wallet/dex dapp for Bitcoin(L1 L2) assets. This wallet also supports to leap your assets between Bitcoin (L1) to Bitcoin L2 (Nervos Network). 

Nomadland wallets extend the necessary functionalities to browsers or applications for Bitcoin(L1 L2) transactions. Users can manage their Bitcoin(L1 L2)  identities securely and review and approve transactions before they are broadcasted to the Bitcoin network.

The transparency of nomad-wallet is also paramount, with many offering open-source codebases for scrutiny on platforms like GitHub. This transparency ensures users can verify the wallet's functionality and trustworthiness, fostering confidence within the community.
